description: '''Gursharanjot Singh Randhawa''' (born 30 August 1991) is an [[India|Indian]] singer, songwriter and music composer associated with [[Music of Punjab|Punjabi]], [[Bhangra (music)|Bhangra]], [[Indi-pop]] and [[Bollywood music]]. He is known for songs like "[[Lahore (song)|Lahore]]", "[[Ishare Tere]]", "[[Slowly Slowly (Guru Randhawa song)|Slowly Slowly]]", and "[[Tere Te]]". Guru Randhawa's debut song was "Same Girl" in collaboration with [[Arjun (singer)|Arjun]].
